oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SYMPLECTIC MODULES OVER OVERRINGS OF POLYNOMIAL RINGS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DHORAJIA, AM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Projective module
unimodular element
cancellation problem
EULER CLASS GROUP
THEOREMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let B be a commutative Noetherian ring of dimension d and let S be a set of all monic polynomials in B[X]. Let A be a subring of S-1B[X] which contains B[X]. Let P be a symplectic A-module of rank 2n >= d, n > 0. Then we prove that ESp(A(2) perpendicular to P, <, >) acts transitively on Um(A(2) circle plus P).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF PURE & APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 43(4)371-390
